attributes.action: Take climate change seriously by taxing roads to the hilt whilst moving towards bio fuels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We've only got about 20 years to save the planet.  Are we going to do it or shall we put individual rights to drive as much as we'd like first?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
